name: netsil
description:
Netsil is the monitoring and analytics product for API and microservices-driven applications.

An auto-discovered topology map of your services lets you find and fix failures faster.

Listen to your APIs, see your apps.
preInstallNotes:
We recommend using 4 CPUs and 12 GB of memory for Netsil.

You will also need to install the `netsil-collectors` package, which feeds network and infrastructure data to Netsil for monitoring.

After installation, go to `https://<dcos_url>/service/netsil` to access Netsil.

Your dcos_url is the URL you initially used to access your DCOS cluster.
postInstallNotes:
Netsil is installing!

In a few moments, go to `https://<dcos_url>/service/netsil` to access Netsil.

Your dcos_url is the URL you initially used to access your DCOS cluster

Also remember to install the `netsil-collectors` package.
